titleStmt.title: A letter concerning confession and absolution: written to a friend som yeers since. And now proposed to the consideration of the gathered churches in London. Imprimatur, John Downame.
titleStmt.author: T. S.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 20 1649"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
